de.dezibel.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dezibel.player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all functionality needed to play music. It acts as a fassade for the JavaFX library.
    Author:
    Richard, Tobias

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Player getInstance()
        Returns an instance of Player.
        Returns:
        The player instance

      • play

        public void play()
        Starts playing the current media. If there is nothing to play or the player is currently playing, nothing happens

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pauses the current media. If there is nothing to pause or the player is already paused, nothing happens

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the current media. If there is nothing to stop or the player has already stopped, nothing happens

      • jumpTo

        public void jumpTo(int pos)
        Jumps to the submitted position in the playlist.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position to jumo to

      • moveUp

        public void moveUp(int index)
        Moves the song at source index one position up.
        Parameters:
        index - The index that has to be moved up

      • moveDown

        public void moveDown(int index)
        Moves the song at source index one position down.
        Parameters:
        index - The index that has to be moved down

      • next

        public void next()
        Jumps to the next medium in the playlist. If the playlist is empty, nothing happens.

      • previous

        public void previous()
        Jumps to the previous medium in the playlist. If the playlist is empty, nothing happens.

      • getVolume

        public int getVolume()
        Returns the volume.
        Returns:
        The volume

      • setVolume

        public void setVolume(int volume)
        Sets the current volume.
        Parameters:
        volume - The new volume. It's effect will be clamped to the range [0, 100]

      • getTotalDuration

        public int getTotalDuration()
        Returns the total duration of the current song in seconds.
        Returns:
        The duration in seconds

      • getCurrentTime

        public int getCurrentTime()
        Returns the already played time of the media in seconds.
        Returns:
        The played time in seconds

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Returns if the player is currently playing.
        Returns:
        true if the player is currently playing, else false

      • getCurrentMedium

        public Medium getCurrentMedium()
        Returns the medium that is currently playing.
        Returns:
        The current Medium

      • setCurrentMedia

        public void setCurrentMedia(int index)
        Sets the currentMedia
        Parameters:
        index - The new index

      • addMedium

        public void addMedium(Medium song)
        Adds a medium to the currentPlaylist
        Parameters:
        song - The Medium to add

      • addMediumAsNext

        public void addMediumAsNext(Medium song)
        Adds a medium to the currentPlaylist
        Parameters:
        song - The Medium to add

      • removeMedium

        public void removeMedium(int index)
        Removes the given medium from the currentPlalist.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the song to remove.

      • addPlaylist

        public void addPlaylist(Playlist playlist)
        Adds the playlist to the currentPlaylist, i.e. appends all songs of the playlist
        Parameters:
        playlist - The playlist to add to the currentPlaylist

      • setPlaylist

        public void setPlaylist(Playlist playlist)
        Replaces the currentPlaylist with the given playlist
        Parameters:
        playlist - The new playlist

      • addMedialist

        public void addMedialist(java.util.LinkedList<Medium> playlist)
        Adds the list of media to the currentPlaylist, i.e. appends all songs of the list
        Parameters:
        playlist - The list of media to add to the currentPlaylist

      • clearPlaylist

        public void clearPlaylist()
        Clears the currentPlaylist.
        Postcondition:
        currentPlaylist = empty

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver(PlayerObserver o)
        Adds the submitted observer to the list of observers
        Parameters:
        o - The observer to add

      • removeObserver

        public void removeObserver(PlayerObserver o)
        Removes the submitted observer from the list of observers
        Parameters:
        o - The observer to remove

      • createPlayer

        private void createPlayer(Medium medium)
        Creates a MediaPlayer object for the given medium, if the medium has a file
        Parameters:
        medium - The medium to create a player for
        Precondition:
        medium != null

      • notifyObserver

        private void notifyObserver()
        Notifies all observers.
        Parameters:
        medium - The currently playing medium

      • getPlaylist

        public java.util.LinkedList<Medium> getPlaylist()

        public int getCurrentIndex()
